Package index

Play-by-Play Events

Download and parse detailed play-by-play event data (the core of Retrosheet).

list_events()
List Available Retrosheet Event Files
get_events()
Download and Parse Retrosheet Event Files
get_game_info()
Get Game Information from Parsed Events
get_plays()
Get Play-by-Play Data from Events
parse_event_records()
Parse Retrosheet Event Records into Structured Format

Game Logs

Access summary statistics for each game (one row per game, ~170 columns). Much faster than full play-by-play events.

list_gamelogs()
List Available Retrosheet Game Log Files
get_gamelogs()
Download and Parse Retrosheet Game Log Files
gamelog_fields()
Get Game Log Field Descriptions

Rosters and Schedules

Get team rosters and game schedules by year.

get_rosters()
Get Retrosheet Rosters
list_schedules()
List Available Retrosheet Schedule Files
get_schedules()
Download and Parse Retrosheet Schedule Files

Reference Data

Download Retrosheet reference data including parks, teams, and player IDs.

get_park_ids()
Get Retrosheet Park IDs
get_team_ids()
Get Retrosheet Team IDs
get_player_ids()
Get Retrosheet Player IDs

Cache Management

Manage cached downloads for faster repeated access.

cache_dir()
Get Retrosheet Cache Directory
cache_status()
Show Cache Status
clear_cache()
Clear Retrosheet Cache
use_cache()
Enable or Disable Caching
